name: Arrakis Finance
description: Arrakis Finance, spun out from Gelato Finance, is a decentralized market-making platform enabling projects to create deep liquidity for their tokens on decentralized exchanges. One such application is their Vaults which automate liquidity provision to Uniswap v3.
